code: "use strict";import*as React from'react';import{useSyncExternalStoreWithSelector}from'use-sync-external-store/with-selector';import{useNavigation}from"./useNavigation.js";export function useNavigationState(selector){const navigation=useNavigation();const subscribe=React.useCallback(callback=>{const unsubscribe=navigation.addListener('state',callback);return unsubscribe;},[navigation]);const value=useSyncExternalStoreWithSelector(subscribe,navigation.getState,navigation.getState,selector);return value;}
